ovdesc.p: This file allows the loans which are drawn under the tranche to be settled against the Tranche redemption schedule dates.
Repayment schedules at the tranche level can be defined through SL.REPAYMENT.SCHEDULES for the particular tranche.
On defining the SL.REPAYMENT.SCHEDULES for the tranche the SL.REPAY.SCHEDS would be build for the tranche redemption schedules.

Each loan drawn under the tranche which has the end period less than or equals to the tranche redemption date will be defaulted in this file for the Loan amount to be settled against the first redemption.
The tranche redemption can be either pro rata against the loans repayment or it can be manually changed by the user for the specific amounts.
